message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we say $135?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
I'm still interested in selling the product to you, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more than $115. How about we say $130?
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. How about we say $110?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we say $125?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit over my budget. How about we say $105?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more serious compromise. How about we say $115?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. How about we say $105?
